Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: Please use ygenalloc(); from include/yajl_utils.h here. If you copied this from another place in our codebase, consider sending a separate patch to clean up that place, too :).

Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: Please add a short test description.

Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: The convention is to use 80 #’s here

Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: cmd_event doesn’t tell the reader anything. I propose removing this block, since the test only tests one thing.

Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: You can use cmd qq|event $event_name "$event_payload"|; to make this slightly more readable (less escaping).

Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: This file is indented using tabs, but we use expandtab (see second line) and 4 spaces. It seems like you are not using vim, but please try to keep the file consistent with what we already have.

Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: style: please use spaces after and before braces, i.e. “sub { $condvar->send(0); }”

Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: Please use the passive form here, i.e. “received custom event”

Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: This seems to be a left-over from debugging. Please remove.

Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: To avoid confusion, I propose renaming this to custom_ipc_event. It’s a mouthful, but _a lot_ clearer than just “event”.
